name: Cox Robert Alfred
description: I am an attractive, kind and very affectionate Person who is active , I am a warm, caring, friendly person who enjoys being around people , especially when passing time with my son and i always treasure our time together . I would like to meet a woman to share life with, while each of us would have space to do our own thing. I and my son are very close , he will say i’m a great Dad who will always be there when needed .he is my life and mean so much to me
